Articles.Content: Basically, Length and mass stats displayed in a nice little window in a corner. No further detail needed really.

If you're ok with mass, switch to Map view and check the right side of KSP screen/window.

Length is ambiguous. It depends on the direction in which you measure it. A plane has length measured horizontally, ship usually verically, for space station it may be tricky to say.

Edited November 29, 2013 by Kasuha

This is on the [thread=36863]What Not to Suggest List[/thread] as it's a very common suggestion, and there are already mods which have this functionality available if you are not averse to using them.

As such, I'm gonna lock this. Have a nice day
